description: Dash through the corridors as Mappy, jumping over hurdles to the beat of the music in this rhythmic platformer.
rationale: Rhythm-based games offer a high engagement level and a clear reward system for AI training. This game combines classic arcade aesthetics with timing-based mechanics, making it an excellent environment for testing precision agents and timing algorithms.
details: The game is a simplified 2D side-scrolling rhythmic platformer. The player controls Mappy, who moves forward automatically at a constant speed. Obstacles (cats and pits) appear at intervals synchronized with a background BPM. The background is a clean, dark grey grid with neon-line characters. The environment is procedurally generated but remains consistent with the music tempo. Performance is tracked via a combo system based on perfect timing.
how_to_build: uv run python -m pip install pygame && uv run python -m build
how_to_stop: kill $(pgrep -f 'python main.py') or press ESC in the game window
how_to_play: Score increases by 10 for every obstacle successfully jumped. A 'Perfect' jump (within 50ms of the beat) yields a 2x combo. Use the 'SPACE' key to jump. The player must avoid colliding with 'Nyamco' cats or falling into pits. If a collision occurs, the game resets and the final score is recorded.
